column4: Guys I have a sd card mounted that has ext2 partition when I click on it and choose "create archive" and choose zip, no matter where I choose every single time i get "an error occurred while adding files to the archive the specified location is not supported"

Guys I have a sd card mounted that has ext2 partition when I click on it and choose "create archive" and choose zip, no matter where I choose every single time i get "an error occurred while adding files to the archive the specified location is not supported"
I have had problems before with ext2 partitions not allowing me write access, you could try as root.
